document: The Use of Ideal Models in Covert Rehearsal to Influence Self-Concept By Ricky Alan Sarkisian B.S. (California State University, Fresno) 1969 M.B.A. (California State University, Fresno) 1970 M.A. (University of California) 1973 DISSERTATION Submitted in partial satisfaction of the requirements for the degree of DOCTOR OF PHILOSOPHY in Education in the GRADUATE DIVISION of the UNIVERSITY OF CALIFORNIA, BERKELEY | Approved: Committee in Charge
